featured.text: After years of research and testing, he learned that synthetics worked best and eventually settled on heat-treated nylon, a strong and durable substance.

definition.zh_def: 耐用的，能夠持久使用的。
definition.en_def: Able to withstand wear, pressure, or damage; long-lasting.
definition.example: The durable materials used in this backpack make it perfect for outdoor adventures.
